aboutMeSection.title: About Us
aboutMeSection.subtitle: A little about our history
aboutMeSection.description:
Founded in 1996, Keepers has established itself as one of the leading logistics operators in the country. Over the years, Keepers Logistics has developed extensive know-how in highly fractional order logistics, standing out for the use of cutting-edge technologies in warehouse management and operations development.

Our ability to understand, plan, and execute is evidenced by our personalized approach, respecting the diverse needs of each client. At Keepers, we are committed to providing an exceptional level of service, exceeding national standards and ensuring customer satisfaction at all stages of the logistics chain.

buttons.label: Receiving
buttons.description: Order picking and preparation (picking) in a differentiated way, substantially reducing the order cycle time, with an accurate system for locating products and methods for transmitting orders via EDI, inventory level controls, ensuring more efficient processes, greater agility in deliveries.

buttons.label: Inspection
buttons.description: Keepers Logistics performs strict control through inspections throughout the material handling, offering its clients a very high inventory accuracy level.
topics: Checking volumes declared on the invoice
Quantitative and qualitative inspection of received materials

buttons.label: Storage
buttons.description: Storage with efficiency and cutting-edge technology ensuring operational quality, in addition to having a storage area with restricted access, monitoring cameras, and an alarm for high-value and attractive products.

buttons.label: Handling
buttons.description: We are prepared for different seasonal demands, being able to develop specific assembly lines according to each client's needs, always complying with the strictest quality criteria, integrating logistics with complementary activities.

buttons.label: Picking
buttons.description: Order picking and preparation (picking) in a differentiated way, substantially reducing the order cycle time, with an accurate system for locating products and methods for transmitting orders via EDI, inventory level controls, ensuring more efficient processes, greater agility in deliveries.

buttons.label: Shipping
buttons.description: Keepers Logistics performs shipping with commitment, ensuring your product is in the right place at the right time.
topics: Aggregate, weigh, pack, order, and check the order
Identification, loading, and dispatch of the vehicle

buttons.label: Distribution
buttons.description: Keepers Logistics has acquired over the years extensive know-how in order distribution in general, especially for highly fractional orders, using the most modern tools in terms of technology Keepers Logistics guarantees the best experience, providing highly efficient distribution.

buttons.label: Management
buttons.description: Keepers Logistics has a modern tool that allows comprehensive, agile, and efficient stock management, managing movements at all points and productivity at each stage, including the entire fiscal flow.
topics: Individual login and password for each user level
Storage management and FIFO and LIFO control
Control from the gatehouse to delivery

integradorSection.title: A 100% Online System
integradorSection.detailed_description: Our order and invoice integration system optimizes your logistics operations with efficiency and precision. Track orders in real time, issue invoices, generate detailed reports, create new orders, view updated inventory, and import and track all invoices. All in an integrated platform with an intuitive interface. Additionally, you can chat directly with our support staff for immediate assistance.

systemSection.title: Proprietary system
systemSection.description: A proprietary order integration system offers total customization, greater efficiency, and complete data control, ensuring security and reliability. With specialized technical support, you get tailor-made solutions for the success of your business.
